## Checklist (mandatory)

- [ ] This PR contains **exactly one ADR**
- [ ] The ADR follows the official template
- [ ] The **Context** clearly describes the current situation and
      constraints
- [ ] At least one **alternative option** was considered (where
      applicable)
- [ ] **Consequences** (technical, operational, organizational) are
      documented
- [ ] Known **risks and mitigations** are described
- [ ] The ADR status has been set to **Accepted or Rejected**
- [ ] No implementation code is included in this PR
- [ ] The ADR branch will be **deleted after merge**

## Reviewer Guidance

Reviewers should focus on:
- clarity of the problem statement,
- soundness of the decision rationale,
- completeness of consequences,
- long-term impact and reversibility.
